Name: exportPath
Notes: PRODUCTION FILE: Changes will affect script output. Don't modify unless you know what you're doing!

Name: importPath
Notes: File supports new store automation plans in Otter as well as other standalone utility scripts.

Name: octet4
Notes: <-- DO NOT change these numbers or move them around. Adding items to this list is ok. Order is gw, dc, app, sql, ?, hv, novar

Name: hvold
Notes: Array items need to be separated by commas.

Name: serverListOld
Notes: Quotation marks are not necessary for string arrays.

Name: targetExportSharePath
Notes: For some reason array values must be converted to their own variables.

Name: environmentName
Notes: ie. Cannot reference $matrix.serverlistold[2], but $serverlistold[2] works. -Verify

Name: OtterTargetPath
Notes: Redundant? Check usage.

Name: SMBdescription
Value: VM Exports from Gold Hyper-V server

Name: SMBtemporary
Notes: Bool items should be true or false

Name: Exportforce
Notes: Technically true can be anything, and false must be "false" or "".

Name: ConPSDescription
Value: Temporary drive for copying exported VMs

Name: serverClass
Notes: 0=(none), 1=tst, 2=dev, 3=stg, 4=prd (None is default)

Name: serverNumber
Notes: usually 1, will be 2 if the store already has a 1

Name: matrixPath
Notes: Stores configuration information that doesn't change often

Name: neoPath
Notes: Has store information that changes each time a store is built

Name: Vmenvironment
Notes: temp

Name: splunkInstall
Notes: add \STPStoreDeviceConfig or \STPStoreGatewayConfig for VM\HV installs, respectively.

Name: ifGUID
Notes: NIC GUIDs stay the same after the gold VM is cloned allowing us to reference them to find the correct interface.

Name: dhcpScope
Notes: start\end IP for each scope. New scopes should be in form x,y,n where x is the start address, y is the end address, and n is the third octet offset from base.

Name: hostAppAddresses
Notes: Use sql, app, and adc as aliases. Script should be written to substitute corrosponding IP addresses

Name: odsServer
Notes: Normally stp-odssql73 for production.

Name: autoGenerated
Value: *variables below this line are auto generated by the script*

Name: serverListNew
Notes: Generated by generate-server-names.ps1

Name: octet2
Notes: Generated by Get-StoreSubnet.

Name: octet3
Notes: Generated by Get-StoreSubnet.
